subcategory.name: 404 Pages
subcategory.description: 404 page examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS 404 page examples to show a "Page not found" message to visitors when they get lost. These page examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
